Talk02:
On that day, the land shook, and huge
chasms that seemed bottomless opened
in the ground.<sp:0:4:0>The clouds billowed and rolled as floating
islands appeared in the skies, raining
chunks of ruins down on us.<sp:0:4:0>And strangest of all, Hyrule Castle began
to float in the air. It's hard to believe this
is our world now.<sp:0:4:0>Whoever started calling it <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>
had the right idea.
Talk03:
An evil-looking haze surged up from the
chasms that opened on the surface.<sp:0:4:0>The haze weakens everything it touches.
People fall ill when exposed to it, and it
has another curious property as well.<sp:0:4:0>As if guided, the miasma coiled about our
weapons. There isn't a single weapon we
know of that hasn't decayed as a result.<sp:0:4:0>We're calling the stuff <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>.
Talk04:
We decided to call the islands hanging in
the sky "<clr:0000>sky islands<clr:ffff>." Simple and to the
point is best, it seemed.<sp:0:4:0>I suspect, based on the design motifs on
them, that the ruins falling from the sky
are Zonai in origin.<sp:0:4:0>We still understand so little about the
Zonai civilization. All we know is that it
flourished in the sky.<sp:0:4:0>While it's true that the Upheaval has
posed major problems in every aspect
of life in Hyrule...<sp:0:4:0>I can't deny that it's also presented us
with an opportunity to answer questions
we've long had about our history. Hmmm.
Talk05:
We've started investigating the fallen
ruins and the sky islands.<sp:0:4:0>Our best lead is a report from the chief of
Kakariko Village that some unusual ruins
and engraved slabs have fallen there.<sp:0:4:0>I decided to have the Zonai Survey Team
work out of Kakariko Village in Necluda,
southeast of Lookout Landing.<sp:0:4:0>The ruins that fell on Kakariko Village are
massive. You can see them from all the
way here at Lookout Landing.
Talk06:
The crater left by the castle's rise is still
spewing gloom. It's kept us from making
any progress with our investigation.<sp:0:4:0>We still don't know anything about where
the princess and Link have gone.<sp:0:4:0>The Upheaval occurred very soon after
Princess Zelda and Link left to explore
beneath Hyrule Castle.<sp:0:4:0>I fear the two events are related...
